DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect pentoxifylline use preparation semen sample use ICSI infertile men complain mild moderate asthenozoospermia ( i.e . case need motility enhancement prior ICSI ) comparison semen sample without pentoxifylline preparation outcome ICSI .
DOC.brief_title: Beneficial Effect Adding Pentoxifylline Processed Semen Samples ICSI Outcome Infertile Males
DOC.detailed_description: The primary outcome measure number oocytes retrieve , number oocyte inject , number oocyte fertilize , fertilization rate , number embryos quality ( G1 : good embryo , G2 : fair embryos G3 : bad embryo ) , number embryo transfer ( ET ) , number embryo sac , embryo implantation rate , pregnancy rate abortion rate 3 group pregnancy rate abortion rate group ( I ) group ( II ) .
DOC.criteria: seek ICSI infertility Pyospermia , presence antisperm antibody . Azoospermia , severe male factor , severe asthenozoospermia . Past history orchitis . Patients receive empirical treatment asthenozoospermia e.g . oral Pentoxifylline , lcarnitine antioxidant past 3 6 month . Diabetics , hypertensives patient chronic systemic illness . Wife 's age 35 year . Low antral count . Presence ovarian factor contribute infertility e.g . polycystic ovary .
